name: The Angry Banana
description: The Angry Banana is a short 2D action game with a funny story that's full of NONSENSE! You go out on a journey to avenge your "family". But, will you be able to?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Later Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.8 GHz, or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4650 / NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 / Intel HD 4000 Graphics, or equivalent Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card Additional Notes: *DEFAULT KEYBOARD CONTROLS: 1) Arrows = Move 2) Space = Jump 3) Left Alt = Throw 4) Left Shift = Kick 5) Left Ctrl = Run
